artist: Artist: Jean-Gabriel Daragnès , et al.; Author: Paul Valéry, French, 1871-1945 , et al.; Publisher: Daragnès pour la ville de Paris, Paris
creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
description: Illustrated with 62 original etchings that accompany 31 texts describing Paris neighborhoods and life. 31 etchings in full page by Matisse, Vlaminck, Derain, Van Dongen, Bonnard, and others. Texts in French by Valery, Cain, Sauret, Morand, and others; 294 pages in text, plus Index of all contributors, literary and artistic.
image_copyright: © Jean-Gabriel Daragn%C3%A8s %2F Artists Rights Society %28ARS%29%2C New York %2F ADAGP%2C Paris
medium: Etchings, with letterpress; unbound as issued
provenance: Ruth and Bruce Dayton, Wayzata, Minn.; given to MIA, 1991.
title: Paris 1937
